section.p: You can view the details of all subscriptions customers have created for your services. The following information on a subscription is available:
To view the details of a subscription, use the View subscription menu option in the Customer menu of the administration portal.

To offer support to customers, enables you to enter a support email address for your organization. This allows administrators and subscription managers of customer organizations to directly contact you in case they have questions or want to report issues on a service they have subscribed to. To enter a support email address, use the Edit profile menu option in the Account menu of the administration portal.
You can explicitly terminate a customer subscription.

To terminate a subscription, use the Terminate a subscription menu option in the Customer menu of the administration portal. As soon as you terminate a subscription, the customer is sent an email informing him about the termination and the reason you have entered.

If you have granted brokers the permission to publish your services, you can also terminate subscriptions of your brokers' customers.
